settings.title: How do I begin using your services?
settings.answer: Select your career path (Mining, Government, or Working Holiday), choose your preferred package, and proceed to checkout. You’ll receive an email with further instructions once your payment is confirmed.

settings.title: Can I get a consultation before purchasing a package?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary consultations to help you decide which package suits your needs best. Contact us through our live chat or email to schedule a session.

settings.title: Do I need to provide any documents or information to start?
settings.answer: Yes, we’ll request your current resume (if available), job preferences, and any specific requirements for your career path during the onboarding process.

settings.title: How long does it take to complete my resume and cover letter?
settings.answer: For the $350 and $500 packages, we deliver within 5 business days. For $750 packages, delivery takes 7 business days due to the added services included.

settings.title: Can I upgrade my package after purchase?
settings.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher package at any time by paying the difference. The upgraded services will commence immediately after payment.

settings.title: Do you offer expedited services?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer a 48-hour express delivery option for an additional fee. Contact our support team to request expedited processing.

settings.title: What if I’m not satisfied with the resume or cover letter?
settings.answer: We offer unlimited revisions within 14 days of delivery to ensure you’re completely satisfied with the final product.

settings.title: Do you guarantee job placement with your services?
settings.answer: While we cannot guarantee job placement, our tailored services are designed to significantly improve your chances by presenting you as a top candidate.

settings.title: What if I need visa application assistance for working holiday jobs?
settings.answer: Our Working Holiday packages include comprehensive visa guidance to ensure your application is complete and compliant with current regulations.

settings.title: How does your subscription plan work?
settings.answer: Our subscription plan offers ongoing support for job seekers. You’ll receive a fresh cover letter, resume update, or LinkedIn optimisation every month to keep your materials up to date as you apply for new roles.

settings.contact_info_text: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
